pun.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: an amusing use of a word or phrase that has two meanings, or of words that have the same sound but different meanings
pun.translation[0].definitions[0].note.t: forgive/excuse/pardon the pun (=used to show you know you are making a pun)
pun.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The clergy prey (no pun intended) on bereaved families.
pun.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: In this line, Hamlet puns on the meaning of ‘saw’.
